doc:
Noel Dyson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Noel_Dyson 0 Elsie Noël Dyson (23 December 1916 – 29 June 1995) was an English actress.Dyson appeared in a number of stage and films but is best remembered as a versatile television actress who became a familiar face to British viewers in a career spanning almost 50 years. Dyson's best remembered roles are as Ida Barlow, one of the original characters in the long-running soap opera Coronation Street (1960–61), and Nanny in the sitcom Father, Dear Father (1968–73). Elsie_Noël_Dyson ( 23_December_1916 – 29_June_1995 ) was an_English_actress.Dyson appeared in a_number of stage_and_films but is_best_remembered as a_versatile_television_actress who became a_familiar_face to British_viewers in a_career spanning almost_50_years . Dyson 's_best_remembered_roles are as Ida_Barlow , one of the_original_characters in the_long-running_soap_opera_Coronation_Street_(_1960 – 61_) , and Nanny in the_sitcom_Father , Dear_Father_(_1968 – 73_) .
